comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: June 2, 1913 according to date on negative. The same day, the NYT query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9B00E7D8143FE633A... indicated that a big party of mothers, babies, and toddlers would be taken from East 23rd Street to Sea Breeze, Coney Island for 2 weeks. 300-500 would leave every Monday morning until October.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Retired Rambler, Go through to the PDF and you will find a second article on Outings for the Poor.  The NYT's article segmentation is not always perfect.  When a piece is very short, it often is combined with the following piece.
